Reviews.Title: “Good budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: elena_badalyan
Reviews.Content: price location major reason choice hotel hotel meets expectations beside metrostation value night basement connecting kitchen morning staff offered change 6th floor balcony 24hour shop cafe hotelroom clean comfortable

Reviews.Title: “Don't be put off by 'Nightmare in Madrid ISIS' review! A great, clean and friendly budget hotel!”
Reviews.Author: KNWalker
Reviews.Content: reading review hotel id booked holiday boyfriend worried ourselves expect fears eased straight arrival hotel staff helpful friendly offered choice twin double map details local metro system basic clean view city shower feature breakfast simple hot drink juice pastry nice price paid surrounding hotel wasnt tourist means bad previous review local station 5 min walk easy cheap trains run 3 mins throughout day 15 mins late evening city center walkable metro strongly suggest 10 trip ticket 10euros value money highly recommend hotel budget city break madrid book hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Value, Clean, Friendly Budget Accomodation”
Reviews.Author: KMB29
Reviews.Content: hotel cheap madrid werent expect arrived pleasantly surprised clean double bed bathroom clean spacious shower staff friendly helpful hotel 20 minutes bus city centre bus stop outside door hotel cost 1 euro waited breakfast orange juice coffee pastry bargain price paid overall recommend hotel budget travellers looking basic clean friendly accommodation

HotelInfo.Name: Isis Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Antonio Lopez 168, 28026 Madrid, Spain
